name: Kincast
tag_list: private-video-sharing, iphone-video-sharing, mobile-video-uploading, home-movie-hosting, video-back-up, iphone-app
overview:
Kincast provides private video hosting and sharing. Kincast makes it quick and easy to share life moments and experiences with friends and family for when they can’t be there in person

Record a moment and share it with two taps! Sharing is personal and quick like a text message but itâ€™s genuine and visceral.

Kincast is the first company to solve the iPhone “tall screen” or “skinny video” problem, which results from shooting video while holding the phone vertically.

Expect increased social engagement, SMS sharing, and Android development in the near future.
